title: River people of Chad
creator_credit: Visual Education Centre (Germany) and Institut für Film und Bild
brief_description: An adaptation of the film made by the Instutut fur Film und Bild, Munich. Contrasts the modern city of Fort Lamy with the villages of Chad, where men, women and children use primitive tools for farming, fishing and cooking in a communal environment.
